com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util

Class FullScreenVideoUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util.FullScreenVideoUtil

  • public class FullScreenVideoUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Used by the Form class to display videos in fullscreen.
    Author:
    Vance Turnewitsch

    • Constructor Detail

      • FullScreenVideoUtil

        public FullScreenVideoUtil(Form form,
                           Handler handler)
        Parameters:
        form - The Form that this FullScreenVideoUtil will use.
        handler - A android.os.Handler created on the UI thread. Used for displaying a preview of a paused video.

    • Method Detail

      • performAction

        public Bundle performAction(int action,
                            VideoPlayer source,
                            java.lang.Object data)
        Perform some action and get a result. The data to pass in and the result returned are controlled by what the action is.
        Parameters:
        action - Can be any of the following:
        • FULLSCREEN_VIDEO_ACTION_DURATION
        • FULLSCREEN_VIDEO_ACTION_FULLSCREEN
        • FULLSCREEN_VIDEO_ACTION_PAUSE
        • FULLSCREEN_VIDEO_ACTION_PLAY
        • FULLSCREEN_VIDEO_ACTION_SEEK
        • FULLSCREEN_VIDEO_ACTION_SOURCE
        • FULLSCREEN_VIDEO_ACTION_STOP
        source - The VideoPlayer to use in some actions.
        data - Used by the method. This object varies depending on the action.
        Returns:
        Varies depending on what action was passed in.

      • doFullScreenVideoAction

        private Bundle doFullScreenVideoAction(VideoPlayer source,
                                       Bundle data)

      • createFullScreenVideoDialog

        public Dialog createFullScreenVideoDialog()
        Creates the dialog for displaying a fullscreen VideoView.
        Returns:
        The created Dialog

      • prepareFullScreenVideoDialog

        public void prepareFullScreenVideoDialog(Dialog dia)
        Call just before displaying a fullscreen video Dialog. This method sets up some listeners.
        Parameters:
        dia - The dialog that will display the video.

      • dialogInitialized

        public boolean dialogInitialized()
        Returns:
        True if the internal Dialog has been created. False otherwise.

      • showing

        public boolean showing()
        Returns:
        True if dialogInitialized() is true and the Dialog is showing. False otherwise.

      • setSource

        public boolean setSource(java.lang.String source,
                         boolean clearSeek)
        Sets the source to be used by the fullscreen video Dialog. This method also attempts to load the internal VideoView with the source.
        Parameters:
        source - The source path to use. The MediaUtil is used to load the source.
        clearSeek - If True, the video will start playing at position zero. If False, the video will start playing from the VIDEOPLAYER_POSITION value of the Bundle passed in the performAction(int, VideoPlayer, Object) or createFullScreenVideoDialog()
        Returns:
        True if the video was successfully loaded. False otherwise.

      • onCompletion

        public void onCompletion(MediaPlayer arg0)
        Called when the video has finished playing.

      • onPrepared

        public void onPrepared(MediaPlayer arg0)
        Called when the video has been loaded.

      • startDialog

        public void startDialog()
        Called when the Dialog is about to be shown.
